summary: Adds seven high quality, unique rings to the game. Each comes with a unique enchantment.
descriptionHtml:
Adds seven high quality, unique rings to the game. They can be found next to the blacksmith's workbench in Riverwood.

I would like to have recommendations to improve existing rings and new ring ideas. Color requests are appropriate as well.
================================
Added optional file for no enchants. Just install after both update 1 and 2 and replace when it asks
================================
Update 2

Added Ring of Masculinity - Increases Stamina by 50 points + Stamina regenerates 75% faster
================================
Update 1

Added Blacksmith's Ring - Can improve weapons and armor 50% more
================================

Each ring has a unique enchantment that will be sure to help you in tough times.

-Ring of Union - Prices are 50% better + Increases speech skill by 40 points

-Ghost Ring - Move silently + Sneak is improved by 35%

-Vampires Ring - Regenerate magicka 60% faster + Regenerate health 25% faster

-Superior Mage Ring - Magicka regenerates 150% faster + Increases magicks by 15 points

-Master's Ring - Magicka regenerates 150% faster + Health Regenerates 50% faster + Destruction spells cost 40% less

=================================

I would like to thank PrivateEye for helping me out with skinning. Other than that everything was done by me.

If you would like to use this mod or any resources in anything else, just ask.
author: GTX78000
